editInfo.title: Personal information
editInfo.requestInfo: You can request changes to your personal information. Administrators will review your request and approve the changes as they see fit.

logIn.title: Log in
logIn.graphicAlt: MySK logo surrounded by various UI elements from the app

forgor.title: Password reset
forgor.supportingText: Your identity has been verified. Choose a new password and remember it.
forgor.graphicAlt: Lock icon hanging on a thread

name.title: Local name (Thai)
name.prefix_helper: เด็กชาย, นาย, นาง, นางสาว, etc.

checkEmail.title: Check your email
checkEmail.supportingText: An email has been sent to {{email}}. That email contains a link; use it to continue setting your new password.

changePassword.title: Change password
changePassword.supportingText: If you are still using the default password, changing it is highly recommended.

forgotPassword.title: Reset with password
forgotPassword.supportingText: To verify your identity, we will send you an email with a link back to MySK. Follow that link to continue the process.

requestEditProfile.title: Request profile edit
requestEditProfile.supportingText: You can request changes to your personal information. Administrators will review your request and approve the changes as they see fit.

logOut.title: Log out
logOut.supportingText: Are you sure you want to log out?
